TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HttpCacheVaryByParams extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供類型安全方式來設定 屬性。

span.span: Provides a type-safe way to set the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會識別 HTTP`Get`或`Post`ASP.NET 用來唯一識別的回應變化，當有多個資源的快取回的應的參數。The property identifies which HTTP `Get` or `Post` parameters ASP.NET uses to uniquely identify a variation of the response when there are multiple cached responses for a resource. 當回應取決於一組用戶端的輸入，例如標頭或參數時，這非常有用。This is useful when a response depends on a set of client inputs, such as headers or parameters. 與 HTTP 快取控制標頭，不直接相關，但可協助確保用戶端或 proxy 是否因指定的參數。The is not directly related to HTTP cache-control headers, but helps ensure that a client or proxy varies by the specified parameters. 如需詳細資訊`VaryByParams`，請參閱 RFC 2616:超文字傳輸通訊協定，HTTP/1.1，位於[World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 網站](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)站台。For more information about `VaryByParams`, see RFC 2616: Hypertext Transfer Protocol -- HTTP/1.1, available on the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125) site. 請參閱節 14 」 標頭欄位定義 」 的完整詳細資料。See section 14, "Header Field Definitions", for complete details. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何物件從存取相關聯的物件。The following code example demonstrates how the object is accessed from the object associated with an . [!code-csharp[Classic HttpResponse.Cache Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpResponse.Cache Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpResponse.Cache Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpResponse.Cache Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Caching Multiple Versions of a Page

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出 HTTP 回應是否依 或 參數有所不同。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether an HTTP response varies by or parameters.

value.span: 如果 HTTP 要求參數會被忽略，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if HTTP request parameters are ignored; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定屬性，以`true`就相當於[@ OutputCache](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28a9e101-fb44-4198-9cb6-b8a52312fec2)指示詞`VaryByParams`屬性設定為 「 無 」 的資源。Setting the property to `true` is equivalent to setting the [@ OutputCache](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28a9e101-fb44-4198-9cb6-b8a52312fec2) directive `VaryByParams` attribute to "none" for the resource.

span.span: The name of the custom parameter.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出快取是否依據指定的 HTTP 要求參數有所不同。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the cache varies according to the specified HTTP request parameter.

value.span: 如果快取應該依指定的參數值有所不同，則為 。

span.span: if the cache should vary by the specified parameter value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 做為存取子 (getter)，當索引子會傳回`true`指定參數的值位於目前的參數集合，則集合設定為會因 \* （星號），這表示所有參數。When used as an accessor (getter), the indexer returns `true` if a value for the specified parameter is found in the current parameters collection, or if the collection is set to vary by \* (an asterisk), which indicates all parameters. 為 mutator (setter)，使用時索引子設參數的值對應的參數集合中指定的標頭至`true`。When used as a mutator (setter), the indexer sets the value for the parameter in the parameters collection that corresponds to the specified header to `true`. 值 \* 可以指定，這表示所有參數。The value \* can be specified, which indicates all parameters. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何從存取索引子相關聯的物件。The following code example demonstrates how the indexer is accessed from the object associated with an . [!code-csharp[Classic HttpResponse.Cache Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpResponse.Cache Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpResponse.Cache Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpResponse.Cache Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
